website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality range of adorable kids' designs that will come embroidered with their name.
pros: Padded, cotton outer quilted stockings come in a choice of designs (reindeer, dinosaur, angel, and more)
Thick and sturdy stitching to take plenty of gift stuffing
Prompt service and accurate spelling are a plus
cons: The most popular designs sell out often

customer_reviews.title: Very cute! Just as depicted.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone. It came in a timely manner considering it was personalized, the spelling was right and the design was so cute! Just as the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, detail is incredible! I’m very happy with this purchase. My one year said wow when she saw the stocking.
customer_reviews.author: redmond

customer_reviews.title: This is adorable for my new little grandson
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable for my new little grandson. I expect it to last him a lifetime and he will have a childhood keepsake. Super cute and seems like it should hold a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper for life!

customer_reviews.title: Super happy customer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this personalized for my son. I am so glad I did! Amazing quality, something he will have for many years to come!!! It wasn’t suppose to arrive until Christmas Eve but even shipped early arriving at my door 2 days sooner!!! Thanks so much guys! I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a quality stocking that will last through the years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful stocking for my new grandson. Very nicely made. Large print and large stocking to hold gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M. Graves

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gingerbread man stocking
customer_reviews.text: This stocking is so perfect for what I was looking for! I wanted something with a gingerbread man on it and the bonus is getting it personalized. Also the size is just right and the colors are too.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping ,well made,and super cute. Was just as described
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Good overall size and excellent quality materials and stitching
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and really nice quality construction. It also arrived really quickly, especially in light of the personalization during the busy holiday season. My grandson thought it was great, too!
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality was great! Well made and a great gift for my grandson. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mc

customer_reviews.title: Cute and festive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson as his audited had the same one I bought from Zulily. To my surprise, the stocking was an exact match to his sister’s stocking. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: melissa sikes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adorable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I are super happy with these stockings! I ordered 7 and each one was juat beautiful!! Shipping was quick and tracking provided! Very much recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! We bought the snowman
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! We bought the snowman, the Santa, and the bear. Made of lasting material and they look great hanging up!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good strong quality
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. The quality is great and I was so pleased with how cute it was.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: We recommend these adorable stockings
customer_reviews.text: The decorative stockings added bright color and cheer to our fireplace and living room. We were impressed with the quality of workmanship and design. We recommend these adorable stockings!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this stocking for my grandson and absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stocking for my grandson and absolutely love it!! It is very well made and SO very cute. It arrived on time and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer davidson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The stocking is beautiful. I will be ordering about 14 more.
customer_reviews.author: leroy936

customer_reviews.title: Good experience and product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and came as expected. Would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this stocking and my grand daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these personalized stockings for my 2 kids based on the positive reviews. I am pleased to say that these reviews were on target. They are beautiful and good quality, they are lined with a satiny material, soft and thick quilted outside with cute detailing of the gingerbread man and snowman. I was even more surprised by the quickness in shipping after ordering particularly for personalized products. Very happy Mommy!
customer_reviews.author: Lezly & Liam’s Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Loved these stockings!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these: the dinosaur, Santa, & reindeer. These stockings more than exceeded my expectations. They are excellent quality. Super thick sturdy material similar to a oven mitt. The details are super nice & the embroidery was so cute. I never write reviews, but I felt compelled to let everyone know that I would highly recommend these stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality stocking. Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: The green is a little brighter than it looks. The name wasn’t fully centered possibly due to the style on top
customer_reviews.author: Happiness

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Very good quality. Large size - perfect for holding lots of Christmas goodies.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We love the new stocking, made for our newest granddaughter. It should last a lifetime, made very well and the colors are vibrant. Roomy for lots of goodies from Santa!
customer_reviews.author: Glynis McKay

customer_reviews.title: but it was perfect! Made from a thick fabric
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this because there weren't a lot of reviews, but it was perfect! Made from a thick fabric, exactly as pictured, and perfectly done embroidery! Very happy with this purchase and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RFamily

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas hit.
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and the perfect size. It is easy to get things in and out. This was a gift for my 8 month old granddaughter and she loved the reindeer! I would definitely buy another of these from his seller!
customer_reviews.author: Mom's Christmas List

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy, the hanger is held on with a grommet ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this product! It is very well made. It's sturdy, the hanger is held on with a grommet which will hold all the goodies, and it even has a nice lining inside. The reindeer are adorable and the embroidery is done well. I will definitely by more as we get more Grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: The workmanship was top notch and characters were perfect. My 92 year old Greek mother is YaYa ...
customer_reviews.text: As I said in my last review, this product was exceptional. The workmanship was top notch and characters were perfect. My 92 year old Greek mother is YaYa to her great granddaughter so she got quite a kick out of it. For some reason seniors seem to love whimsy.I wish I had seen this product before I purchased other stockings in the past. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: CJJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Good quality! Arrived timely. Will be able to enjoy it for years and years. Will definitely purchase another one when I get more grandbabies:-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was for my first grandson and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Seadoc

customer_reviews.title: a first Christmas for our rescue dog
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked, really wanted to find something more girlie. Read all the reviews sounded really nice and since she is a hound dog this one fit the bill. This stocking is so darn cute, well made even lined to hold some goodies for her, looks exactly like the picture provided. We think Maggee will love seeing it hung up over the fireplace for Santa's visit.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B & Judith C Roehrig

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Christmas Stocking
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful Christmas stocking! Colorful, well made, and a perfect size. My grandson will love this Christmas stocking when he sees it. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stocking, lightning-fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stocking!! Bought for our 10-month old, and it’s perfect. Thick fabric, fantastic embroidery, and bright, fun colors. Plus shipping was lightning fast - got it the next day, even with personalization!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and quick turn around
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and quick turn around. These will be part of our family tradition for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Dean

customer_reviews.title: Fast and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These look great! I can’t believe how fast they came (a week before they were promised). I live in the middle of nowhere, so it takes several days for me to receive even Amazon Prime items. I got these in the mail just a few days after I ordered them. They must have finished the personalization almost instantaneously. I’ve never seen a custom item done so fast. And they look way better than I imagined. These aren’t printed stockings; all the pieces are beautifully sewn on. The personalization is all embroidered. My kids are going to be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: roger quint

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaur is too cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Very sturdy material, worth the $35 my son is gonna love it
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Dino stocking for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, heavy duty stocking made for stuffing full of goodies! Good customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: D. Carr

product_meta.title: DIBSIES Personalization Station Personalized Quilted Christmas Stocking (Reindeer)
product_meta.description: Style Name:ReindeerBring joy to your holiday season with this adorable Quilted Christmas Stocking featuring smiling and festive Reindeers with colorful antlers. Dibsies makes it extra special by adding his/her name FOR FREE up to 9 Letters Max in a sparkling white embroidery.***PLEASE READ*** Your order will automatically be processed with the name of your choice.*** Dimensions: Approx. 17.5'' x 8.5'' Reindeer stocking includes brilliant felt Reindeers appliqué and colorful antlers. 100% Cotton Twill Outer. 100% Polyester Lining and Padding. Machine washable. Personalize with any name for free up to 9 Letters Max!
feature_bullets: ***PLEASE READ*** Your order will automatically be processed with the name of your choice.
Reindeer stocking includes brilliant felt Reindeers appliqué and colorful antlers.
100% Cotton Twill Outer. 100% Polyester Lining and Padding. Machine washable.
Personalize with any name for free up to 9 Letters Max!
